description: Black Forest Overnight Oats! The ultimate, decadent but nutritious and satisfying breakfast that needs no cooking at all and can be made ahead.  With the classic combination of chocolate and cherries, this my friends is seriously yum!
keywords: cherry overnight oats, chocolate cherry overnight oats, chocolate overnight oats
name: Black Forest Overnight Oats
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup (50 grams) rolled/old fashioned oats (, use gluten free oats if necessary.)
1/2 cup (110 grams) fresh or frozen cherries (, pitted )
1/3 cup (80 ml) vegan cream or yogurt

recipeInstructions.text: To a jar or other lidded container add the oats, cocoa powder, chia seeds, chocolate chips, vanilla, maple syrup and milk to a jar. Stir well or put the lid on and give it a good shake.
Top with the cherries (don't stir them in), put the lid on and place in the fridge for at least 6 hours or up to 3 days.
Before serving give it a quick stir and top with vegan cream or yogurt, maybe a few more cherry halves or a drizzle of melted chocolate, then enjoy.
